word:
What can we say, Lord? We are weak ourselves. We need Thy power. We see the work that we have to do. We give ourselves to Thee. Let Thy blessing come to us, and Thy name shall have all the glory. Amen.--Ms 52, 1904, pp. 15, 16. ("A Plea for Unity," Sermon, May 22, 1904.) 

Released January 18, 1977.
